title: I'm level 15 but says I have to be level 15 to post on GD

replies.body: Yeah syncing takes time sometimes. New accounts can try posting in other threads so it syncs.

Sometimes you board profile doesn't sync up quite right with your Summoner level. It looks like your boards level is properly showing that you are level 15 now, so give that GD post another shot!

Hit me back up if it still won't let you post.
